mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.order_no as orderNo, q.supplier_id as supplierId, q.spare_part_id as sparePartId, q.quote_price as quotePrice, q.quote_time as quoteTime, q.delivery_days as deliveryDays, q.is_selected as isSelected, q.created_at as createdAt, s.name as supplierName, sp.name as sparePartName FROM biz_supplier_quote q LEFT JOIN supplier s ON q.supplier_id = s.id LEFT JOIN spare_part sp ON q.spare_part_id = sp.id WHERE q.order_no = #{orderNo} ORDER BY q.quote_price ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_supplier_quote SET is_selected = 0 WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
UPDATE biz_supplier_quote SET is_selected = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
